38Managing maternal and child health programmes:  a practical guide
Example of how to solve a problem:
Monitoring revealed that the midwife at Malibago health centre was achieving the performance target of visiting two
women every week at home to encourage them to seek prenatal care.  Records showed, however, that only a few of thewomen visited actually went to the health centre for prenatal care.
